about: The official repository for the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) model
A Fortran toolkit for interoperating Fortran with C/C++
Quantum chemistry and solid state physics software package
The Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF) is a suite of software tools for developing high-performance, multi-component Earth science modeling applications.
Main repository for the NREL-supported OpenFAST whole-turbine and FAST.Farm wind farm simulation codes.
MAPL is a foundation layer of the GEOS architecture, whose original purpose is to supplement the Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF)
OpenRadioss is a powerful, industry-proven finite element solver for dynamic event analysis
AOMP is an open source Clang/LLVM based compiler with added support for the OpenMP® API on Radeon™ GPUs. Use this repository for releases, issues, documentation, packaging, and examples.
